overview: Lene is back in jail and she has to be the queen bee. Bionca is the warden. And she does not like queen bees. This is one horny chain gangbang. It's a maximum security sex riot. With very physical confrontations between Lene and Debi Diamond and Kaitlyn. And even a food fight that brings in nasty Isis Nile.
title: Bad Girls 2: Stripsearch
